summary: Added team mode support with --team flag for /research, /plan, /implement commands. Created 3 team skills for wave-based multi-agent coordination, pattern documentation, and error handling extensions.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary with all created files and changes
Multi-agent research skill with 2-4 parallel teammates
Multi-agent planning skill with candidate generation
Multi-agent implementation skill with debug support
Wave coordination patterns and synthesis protocol
Extended metadata schema for team execution

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented team mode for wave-based multi-agent coordination. Added --team flag to /research, /plan, /implement commands. Created skill-team-research, skill-team-plan, and skill-team-implement skills with synthesis and debug support. Updated orchestrator routing and error handling.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added 3 team skills (skill-team-research, skill-team-plan, skill-team-implement), 4 context/format files (team-orchestration.md, team-metadata-extension.md, debug-report-format.md, team-wave-helpers.md), updated CLAUDE.md command reference and skill mapping, updated README.md with Team Mode section, updated error-handling.md with team error types

next_steps: Test team mode with CLAUDE_CODE_EXPERIMENTAL_AGENT_TEAMS=1 enabled
